text: Ԑberε a wͻ’buee wͻn nneεma soͻ no, wͻ’hunuu sε yasan de wͻn sika no ama wͻn. Wͻ’kaa sε: “Papa, εdeεn na yεrehwehwε bio? Ye’sika no nie, yasan de ama yεn, na yεbenya aduane pii ama ya’busuafoͻ na yabͻ yenua no nso ho ban, na yanya yoma adesoa nsusueε baako bio aka ho. Woi yε adesoa a εyε mmrε (sε ͻhene no de bεma yεn)”
